metadata.synopsis: Flaming Fist guarding Baldur's Gate (the gate)

0.speaker: Fist 'Deadeye' Mibbs
0.text: What are you waiting for? That lot would do anything to jump this queue.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: The player going in in this state will cause a game overNodeContext: Friendly but insistent

1.speaker: Fist 'Deadeye' Mibbs
1.text: We've been told to expect you - head on through.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: The player going in in this state will cause a game overNodeContext: Polite/insistent

2.speaker: Fist 'Deadeye' Mibbs
2.text: Leave! Before you have nothing left to go back to.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: The player will be able to control the Brain if they go in in this stateNodeContext: Menacing threat

3.speaker: Fist 'Deadeye' Mibbs
3.text: The Upper City's closed. Leave. Now.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: The player will be able to control the Brain if they go in in this stateNodeContext: Tense; as if his life depends on the player not passing (but trying not to show it)
